creator: khammond25@home.com
text:
The WebTesting: Http Authorization "Save" dialog has the wrong title.  The 
title is currently "Open", and of course, it should be "Save".
Also, the accept button is labeled "Open" instead of "Save".
creator: khammond25@home.com

text:
Created attachment 578
Patch for AuthPanel.java; file contains the diff
creator: khammond25@home.com
khammond25@home.com
text:
Description of my patch:

The SAVE action was calling FileDialoger.promptToLoadFile() instead of 
FileDialoger.promptToSaveFile(String filename).  I set the filename to null 
since we do not seem to have a default filename.  May be handy in the future if 
we did.

Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com

text: Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
